Summary: [tg] strange lights and sounds, on street and house
trends: There have been 9 other sightings in Owensboro
There were no other sightings in Owensboro on or around December 7th 2010
divs: sighting detailsdecember 7, 2010 event is on going. every night. stopped video recording due to camcorder being full, computer laptop is full of hours of recordings. won't erase, so i have no way of knowing if it's still going on, but presume strongly that it is. 1) i was sleeping during this occurrences, you can hear me snoring in the background. 2) i had sat my video camera in my front window for security purposes, after an attempted break in. to my surprise i discovered when viewing the recording the next day, all of the weird lights and noises which had been caught. 3) other than the one night of seeing numerous lights on the front end of something, i had no idea what it was because it sat so far up off the ground. 4) other than the first night i have not seen an object that some of the lights are emitting from, some of these strange lights are being emitted from a house catty corner from mine across the street. 5) for the time being i wish to remain reserved for the moment on making comment about my feelings, reactions etc. but i will report that since i became aware of these occurrences since october 23, i have lost weight, have blurred vision, suffer from periodic headaches, and extreme loss of appetite, i have experience the sensation of heat and heart palpitations which have awakened me from a sound sleep. i always sleep through the night, but rarely do now. 6) it simply disappeared. the following is a video i came across while investigating what is happening here. though mr. [name removed\cms\tg] of sara inc.(scientific application research association) denies that their invention of acoustic waves emits any light with it, if you were to use this video as a source for a description of what i have on video, then you'll come closure to witnessing what i actually saw being pointed and directed at my truck and west side of my house on the first nights recording. though this video has other applications of weaponry, i direct you to the first demonstration. \watch?v=qjsnozj4lvg since your witness notice and election for release of contact information does not disclose who any third party identity i do not give permission for my identity or this information to be divulged, released in part of in whole to anyone outside of mufon. also since your site is set up wherein some cannot copy and paste what they have filled out on your site, i took the precaution of video taping and copying each section i did type up as well as the questions asked for my own protection and\or rights of privacy. i wish to be contacted as discussed with david mcdonald. if this is some government entity performing such actions against the public without consent or knowledge as has been perpetrated by our own government, which is ongoing abuse of the citizens of america, then do not contact me in anyway, form or fashion, as i think you've done quite enough.
